title: Topic 003 Question 066
body: You have a Microsoft Entra tenant named Contoso.com and an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster AKS1.
You discover that AKS1 cannot be accessed by using accounts from Contoso.com.
You need to ensure AKS1 can be accessed by using accounts from Contoso.com. The solution must minimize administrative effort.
options: From AKS1, upgrade the version of Kubernetes.
From Microsoft Entra, add a Microsoft Entra ID P2 license.
From Microsoft Entra, configure the User settings.
